column3: meh. Â The mac n cheese didn't have much flavor to it
column4: and I am not a fan of the bread crumb topping at all. Come to think of it
column5: the corn bread didn't have much flavor either. It was pretty dry and I have had better from a box from Trader Joes. Husband said the beans were good
column6: I thought they were just ok. Honestly
column7: the slaw was pretty bad. I thought I would like it more because it's not too saucy
column8: which is good for me considering that in my version of hell
column9: everything is covered in mayo. But it just wasn't good. The cabbage pieces were too large and again didn't have a good flavor. I took two bites and offered the rest to my husband
column10: who will eat pretty much anything
column11: and even he declined. Oh well.
